pages.title: Viridian Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Earth with Runes of Earth.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer a boost to its speed; can also hasten the user on demand. When used in a staff the caster can make people in a radius more resistant to harm.

pages.title: Viridian Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
